title: cyDisputing other parts of the claim
captionHeading: cyRespond to a property possession claim
introLinkText: cyview the claim (opens in new tab)
introParagraph: cyYou should {{link}} to see if there's any other parts of the claim that are incorrect or you disagree with.
includesList: cy{{claimantName, possessive}} grounds for possession (their reasons for making the claim)
cyany documents they've uploaded to support their claim
cyany other information they've given as part of their claim
